root.name: Alone in the Dark 2
root.description: Taking place one year after the original Alone in the Dark, Edward Carnby dons a tommy gun and takes on 1920's gangsters and ghost pirates to rescue a kidnapped child.When an old colleague disappears while investigating the kidnapping of young Grace Saunders, Edward Carnby pulls up his sleeves to get to the bottom of things and embarks on another journey deep into the haunted mansion, "Hell's Kitchen".. The path leads from a villain named One Eyed Jack, to forbidden rituals and to an ancient pact. It turns out also that even the smallest can make all the difference between life and death. What is the mystery of "Hell's Kitchen"? What does the "Flying Dutchman" has to do with all it? And in the end, will the learner surpass the master?
